name: Cookie Defense!
description:
Cookie Defense! is a top-down shooter where you defend your cookies from the onslaught of neighborhood kids. As The Bell Master himself, you will use your bell-gun to whirl the kids off the screen before they eat your freshly baked cookies.

This game was created for the 40 Hour Make A Thing Jam in May, 2016. Cookie Defense! was created based from the keywords "Bells, Spry, Rocket".

While the artwork is our own, we do not own the music or audio used in this project. That copyright goes to its rightful owners.

We are a small team of game development students which specialise in a mix of design and programming. We are:

  • Jacob Duniam - Programmer (Ironically studying Design)
  • Tristan Barrett - Design
  • Nicola Harvey - Audio
  • Noah Seymore - Art
